reviews.content:
Work’s on my iPhone 11,iOS 13.5, Unc0ver 3.5.1
Best Keyboard Tweak ever!!!

Works good, but in WhatsApp when select the Razer Chroma RGB (Key text + Key Caps), the text bar keeps in dark mode (where is the camara, sticker panel and microphone) even if you have the light mode. 

iOS 13.5 iPhone XS

I love this app already and I just installed it. I’ll follow up with any more pros or cons. I wish people did more reviews on here for tweaks. Awesome job I hope you keep on making these great tweaks! A++++++
